title: Colin Cowherd's Instant Reaction - Bears/Patriots MNF, Belichick Beating
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd's Instant Reaction - Bears/Patriots MNF, Belichick Beating
description:
Colin gives his instant reaction to the Bears surprising dismantling of the Patriots in Foxboro, and If it’s the beginning of a real turnaround for the Bears, and the utter shock of Bill Belichick getting out coached by Chicago rookie HC Matt Eberflus, and his bizarre benching of Mac Jones.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
